ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Utility functions for interacting with R processes from external programs. This package includes functions to save and restore session information (including loaded packages, and attached data objects), as well as functions to evaluate strings containing R commands and return the printed results or an execution transcript.

Utility functions for interacting with R processes from external programs. This package includes functions to save and restore session information (including loaded packages, and attached data objects), as well as functions to evaluate strings containing R commands and return the printed results or an execution transcript.

name: r-session
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.0.3' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-session
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/session_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/session/session_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0523ba74905196af7f5828a75a8c81b8e68ebb3d8481f3d618cd95c354f0ac12

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('session')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('session')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=session
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Utility functions for interacting with R processes from external programs. This package
    includes functions to save and restore session information (including loaded packages,
    and attached data objects), as well as functions to evaluate strings containing
    R commands and return the printed results or an execution transcript.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - adomingues

# Package: session
# Description: Utility functions for interacting with R processes from external programs. This package includes functions to save and restore session information (including loaded packages, and attached data objects), as well as functions to evaluate strings containing R commands and return the printed results or an execution transcript.
# Title: Functions for interacting with, saving and restoring R sessions.
# Version: 1.0.3
# Date: 2011-08-26
# Maintainer: Gregory R. Warnes <greg@warnes.net>
# Author: Gregory R. Warnes.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# Packaged: 2012-10-29 08:59:41 UTC; ripley
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2012-10-29 08:59:41
